comments.body:
Hi there!

We may re-evaluate this move in the future, but we did our best to avoid adding it. Due to the growth of the feedback community, we have found this a necessary move for the reasons you've mentioned.
Simplified subject to aid in searching. Please don't put everything in the title of your post.

Yes, these ideas sound good. Funnily enough, I just submitted another post jointly with ClayGoddessSari that tries to address the same problems you do, and some of our ideas even overlap. You should take a look at them :)

I hope Nova and team take these ideas into consideration.
All I did was update the topic line and read the entire post here so it'd be easy to tell from the team at a glance if we're talking about the over all minecraft.net site, the bug site, or this one.
Un nuevo portal y nuevo mob la luci√©rnagas

YES! I would love to actually search the marketplace for letting the creators know something is or isn't happening, instead of searching all over the internet to tell them the information. 

 

OMG posts in 2018???!!!

When I bought minecraft and opened it and closed it it showed minecraft trial. I think the way to fix this is to make minecraft trial and original two separate apps in Microsoft Store. Can you please do this?
Por favor arrume o bug de erro de conex√£o quando for jogar multijogador na Xbox live

Can you make so that whenever withers shoot
They don't drop dirt or sand blocks
Please add CCTV camera and a monitor to see the view of CCTV camera and add more animals like snake,etc

I hope the team is still considering this because a lot of unique ideas are getting flagged for removal because some 8 year old kid made a 6 word post on the same feature. This would allow the community to help moderate the feedback website and ensure posts are quality and follow the rules, and if a post already has your general idea and you have to reply as a comment, people can raise your comments profile higher if your idea is a solid improvement on the suggestion.

Does the team see new comments made on a three year old post with 7 votes? If not, that is probably the biggest issue with the feedback website considering many ideas are already posted and you cannot share your take on it.

Suggestions : a rare potion that can be only found in jungle temples and it has a 1 in 387 chance of spawning, this potion will tp you into ur last spawn point but damages all your equiped armor durability and the tools in your hotbar a little
Suggestion:pillagers outlost upgrade maybe a a camp place a place where they trap villagers all the haybales they looted from villages or something else

Hello sir I'm from Minecraft pocket edition please change location of files into old location because I have a Xiaomi phone and it's cleaner clean my save file like my worlds it will be clean and I can't recover my world so please change the location of save files into old location please

hello Minecraft, in this perfect game things are very good in this new update there's nothing to complain about, but you could add the songs you have in java Editon and put them in Minecraft mcpe and bedrock Editon, but besides that the update is perfect.thanks
That in Minecraft bedrock the ax does the same attack damage as Minecraft Java but this would be the only tool with recharge time.
That there Is a unique enchantment for the shield that when you hit It with the ax It does not take too long to recover. How to recharge one, two, and three that makes It take less Time to replenish.

In an update in the future it would be really cool to see wolf armor or something along those line. One more thing that would be neat is if you could make the callers glow when using a glow ink sac. Those are my suggestions.

 

-ItsBantox
I like all the ideas but not the last note. Small changes can sometimes have a big impact on the game and this is the only official place where small changes like this can be shared.
Posts may lose rating quality if the post gets reported. If the post has too low quality for too long, it may get removed.
Wait, this post is under review even though it only has one vote?!

Ser√≠a muy especial que Minecraft Legends original saliera el 12 de diciembre de 2026, el D√≠a de la Virgen de Guadalupe. Ser√≠a un homenaje bonito para los jugadores mexicanos.

Quiero pedir que Minecraft Legends original en m√≥vil tenga m√°s skins inspiradas en M√©xico: nuestra cultura, tradiciones, vestimentas t√≠picas y personajes importantes. Ser√≠a muy bonito ver skins de artistas mexicanos como Mar√≠a F√©lix, Pedro Infante, Pedro Fern√°ndez, Jorge Negrete, Cantinflas, Valent√≠n Trujillo, Antonio Aguilar, √Ångela Aguilar, Christian Nodal y Vicente Fern√°ndez, adem√°s de h√©roes hist√≥ricos como Miguel Hidalgo, Morelos, Josefa Ortiz, Vicente Guerrero, Ignacio Zaragoza, Moctezuma, Cuauht√©moc, Benito Ju√°rez, Pancho Villa, Emiliano Zapata, Madero, Carranza y Porfirio D√≠az. Tambi√©n me gustar√≠a ver trajes t√≠picos como mariachis, charros, vestidos mexicanos, huipiles, rebosos, ropa ind√≠gena y guaraches, as√≠ como personajes ind√≠genas y aztecas. Tambi√©n quiero skins relacionadas con la fe que muchas personas tienen: la Virgen de Guadalupe, Juan Diego, Jes√∫s, la Virgen de los Dolores, San Juan Evangelista, San Judas Tadeo, San Mart√≠n Caballero, San Mart√≠n de Porres, San Rafael, Santiago Ap√≥stol, Mar√≠a Magdalena, la Virgen de Juquila, la Virgen de San Juan de los Lagos, el Divino Ni√±o, el Ni√±o Dios, los Reyes Magos, San Felipe de Jes√∫s, Santa Cecilia, Cristo Rey, el Sagrado Coraz√≥n de Jes√∫s, el Inmaculado Coraz√≥n de Mar√≠a, la Inmaculada Concepci√≥n, San Miguel Arc√°ngel, Santa Rosa de Lima y Santa Teresa de Jes√∫s. Tambi√©n me gustar√≠a que Petra tuviera skins con ropa mexicana, vestidos t√≠picos y estilo ind√≠gena. Todo ser√≠a muy especial para los jugadores de M√©xico.

Tambi√©n quiero pedir que Minecraft Legends original en m√≥vil permita usar skins personalizadas, pero no solo las skins oficiales, sino que podamos elegir un archivo desde la galer√≠a del celular, igual que se puede hacer en Minecraft Bedrock. Que el jugador pueda elegir su skin personalizada desde una imagen o un archivo PNG guardado en el tel√©fono y que el juego lo reconozca como una skin para el personaje. Esto ayudar√≠a mucho a los jugadores que quieren usar su propia skin y no solo las skins que vienen por defecto. Ser√≠a una opci√≥n muy buena para la comunidad y muchos jugadores lo agradecer√≠amos.

uh oh

At least make it so there is a further drop down menu when you are in Posts, that allow you to view only posts in specific categories.

...I don't think this is the right place for a question like that, this is where we post our ideas on how to change and improve the game..

I don't know if your joking or asking a legitimate question but I will answer it.

You should buy Minecraft because it's a great game, there's so many things you can do, and so much content. Generally Minecraft is my fall back game, if I get a new game I play that until I've beaten it, but once that's done I'll instinctively go to Minecraft. Its the most popular game in the world for a reason.
The old update categories are remained open so there can be suggestions about what to add that is related to things added by that update.

So maybe renaming the categories, and edited official pinned posts (or new ones) from Mojang to fit that description would help to clarify that is the purpose of the category.

Thank you for your information (I also am unable to see your username, so I can't put your name in.).

Or maybe once in 2 years, just to keep things fair.

Not how fair voting works, that's more like rigging. The point is if many users like and vote on an idea, it's more considered, not for few to like an idea that high, that's a false display of popularity.
Maybe there should be only a maximum of 5 votes a post per user overall, with only one vote per 2 years for a user. That should keep things more fair and there is much less rigging on posts.
